content.rendered:
The application period for our
July 2022 Intro to Programming class is now open!

Please note this application period is for our Intro to Programming class only!
Our next application period for the October 2022 Intro AND advanced classes late July 2022.

Wanting to apply for the advanced classes? Use this form to get an email reminder in July when that application period opens.

Who can apply?  We provide a pathway to a tech career for people who might not otherwise have the opportunity, particularly people from low-income, immigrant, or rural backgrounds, and communities of color, ages 18+.  But everyone is welcome to apply, so, regardless of your background, we’d love to hear from you! Just fill out the interest form below.

Are Code the Dream classes right for me? Our classes are intended for individuals looking to make a career change into web development. If you’re still exploring the many different tech fields to determine what is right for you, our classes may be more than you’re looking for. Regardless, feel free to check out our page that helps answer the question: Are CTD classes right for me?

Learn more about our classes before applying
